docs.snippet: Actor Casey Affleck stole the spotlight early at the Golden Globes on Sunday night when he donned a long beard and a man bun on the red carpet - and admitted that even he was embarrassed by his new hairstyle....
docs.lead_paragraph: Actor Casey Affleck stole the spotlight early at the Golden Globes on Sunday night when he donned a long beard and a man bun on the red carpet - and admitted that even he was embarrassed by his new hairstyle.

headline.main: Golden Globes Red Carpet: Casey Affleck's Man Bun, Shimmering Silver Dominate
headline.print_headline: Golden Globes Red Carpet: Casey Affleck's Man Bun, Shimmering Silver Dominate

docs.snippet: "Atlanta" won the Golden Globe award on Sunday for the best television comedy series....

headline.print_headline: 'Atlanta' Wins Golden Globe for Best TV Comedy Series

docs.snippet: A massive crowd of mostly barefoot Filipino Roman Catholic devotees on Monday joined an annual procession of a centuries-old statue of Jesus Christ held under tight security due to fears of a possible attack following the killing of a suspected Is...
docs.lead_paragraph: A massive crowd of mostly barefoot Filipino Roman Catholic devotees on Monday joined an annual procession of a centuries-old statue of Jesus Christ held under tight security due to fears of a possible attack following the killing of a suspected Islamic extremist leader.

headline.main: Huge Catholic Procession Held Under Heavy Security in Manila
headline.print_headline: Huge Catholic Procession Held Under Heavy Security in Manila

docs.snippet: Sophie Brunner scored 16 points, Quinn Dornstauder added 13 more while hauling in 12 rebounds and No. 19 Arizona State rolled to a 71-52 win over Colorado on Sunday....

docs.snippet: State-run Chinese tabloid Global Times warned U.S. President-elect Donald Trump that China would take "take revenge" if he reneged on the one-China policy, only hours after Taiwan's president made a controversial stopover in Houston....
docs.lead_paragraph: State-run Chinese tabloid Global Times warned U.S. President-elect Donald Trump that China would take "take revenge" if he reneged on the one-China policy, only hours after Taiwan's president made a controversial stopover in Houston.

headline.main: Chinese State Tabloid Warns Trump, End One China Policy and China Will Take Revenge
headline.print_headline: Chinese State Tabloid Warns Trump, End One China Policy and China Will Take Revenge
